name: Coconut Pina Colada Smoothie
description: Make into delicious frozen Pina Colada Smoothie ice pops. You colada try these!

ingredients.name: coco vanilla white tea leaves
ingredients.additionalInstruction: or tea leaves of your choice

preparation: Combine tea leaves and boiled water, let completely cool down (do not strain).
In a blender, combine all ingredients, blend until smooth and transfer to 2 tall glasses.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1 slice whole-grain toast and 2 tsp nut butter.
